advanceMatch((bytes32,bytes32),bytes32,b.details: this function is being called repeatedly in turns by the two parties that disagree on the commitment.

returns._0: (bool, Tree.Node, Tree.Node) - if the tournament is finished - the contested parent commitment - the dangling commitment

joinTournament(bytes32,bytes32[],bytes32.details: root tournaments are open to everyone, while non-root tournaments are open to anyone who's final state hash matches the one of the two in the tournament

advanceMatch((bytes32,bytes32),bytes32,b.notice: Advance the match until the smallest divergence is found at current level

innerTournamentWinner().notice: get the dangling commitment at current level and then retrieve the winner commitment

documentation.text: @notice a final state is valid if it's equal to ContestedFinalStateOne or ContestedFinalStateTwo
@notice Non-root tournament needs to propagate side-effects to its parent
